body: I know I am late but thank you for the explanation feyris. Your explanation alone has satisfied me. Coming back to this one over and over just to find one comment about his mind is hard work, but I feel like you have shown me the general population’s opinion on this one. Thank you.

I guess it feels unsatisfying to me because even if he kept his mind in the end, we don't really get a conclusion about if he ended up accepting his condition and found some sort of joy and satisfaction in his new life. I also don't like when there's a mind break, because it doesn't really count as real acceptance in my eyes, and that's more what I'd be looking for in a gender bender doujin. Still, this one has undeniable qualities, like being original

body: Feyris thank you for being the only one to congratulate or at least acknowledge his incredible mind.

The story and the art were good, but I'm really bothered by the dialogues and it kinda ruined it for me. It's unusual that the gender bend victim keeps their mind until the end, so it's original, but I didn't really like it tbh. I prefer when they embrace it completely and become happy about it, but that's just me
